```c
// Global variables
typedef long long LL;
LL n, k;

// Function to calculate the number of elements less than or equal to `x` in a sequence
// generated by a recursive process involving `n` levels.
LL f(LL n, LL x)
    Calls f(...)

// Main function to read input values for `n` and `k`, and print the result of `f(n, k)`.
int main()
    Calls f(...)
```
